HealthPost - Houston, TX - Ruby on Rails

We're currently serving hospitals around the country and need full stack developers to come help us continue building new products. Join now and you'll be on a small team, but this year we're skyrocketing in size and scope, which means your contributions will enhance healthcare for more and more people. Generous pay, vacation, flexibility and other benefits to ensure you are refreshed enough to deliver your most creative work! Write me via my profile.
